original_title: ホラー アクシデンタル2
overview: Kazue Omiya, played by Anri Okamoto, was a little worried about her days with the man she had feelings for. Are we really lovers? Still, she tries her best to devote herself to him. One day, she meets a "scarred woman" standing in a phone booth. That was the beginning of everything. Omnibus style story of 7 episodes. A shocking ending awaits you at the end.
title: Horror Accidental 2
